description: The Lansing River Trail is a gem within the capitol city of Michigan and has been highly rated as one of the best trails around.  Seasonally the trail can flood, causing many disruptions for people using the trail to commute. This skill uses local geological data to determine if the trail is flooded to help users avoid these issues.
exampleInteractions: Alexa Ask Lansing Trail how is the trail
Alexa Ask Lansing Trail what is your status
name: Lansing River Trail
shortDescription: Lansing Michigan River Trail Flood Information
